author: Aris Folley
title: Idaho state lawmaker faces criticism after comparing stay-at-home order to Nazi Germany
description: A Republican state representative from Idaho is facing criticism after she blasted Gov. Brad Little's (R-Idaho) stay-at-home orders in a recent interview and compared the mandates categorizing certain workers as nonessent...
content:
A Republican state representative from Idaho is facing criticism after she blasted Gov. Brad Littles (R-Idaho) stay-at-home orders in a recent interview and compared the mandates categorizing certain workers as nonessential workers to those of Nazi Germany.
